Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. I am offering it to you today at an exclusive price of $140, a special discount just for you. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our product. Let me know if you're interested! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $140. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $140
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
